Lawson is a small town in the Blue Mountains which is located near Sydney, Australia. Its surrounding towns are Ones such as Hazelbrook and Bullaburra.
Lawson is home to many different bushwalking tracks ranging from Easy to Hard. Bushwalds include Adilina Falls, Cateract Falls and echo bluff. Walkers must stay to tracks and look for cliffs.
Apart from bushwalks lawson is home to a skate park, BMX, a 50m olympic Swimming Pool and some small nature and play parks.
Lawson has a small super market, a hardware shop, a pub, a bakery, post office/newsagent to name a few. For better shopping go to Katoomba.
Lawson has one cafe called the Ben Roberts. For dining go to The Lawson Bowling Club or the Blue Mountains hotel.
Lawson has one pub and one Bottle Shop located in the pub.
Lawson consists of no running hotels and few B&B's. Katoomba has more range
